qas.question: Bell implemented Gray's design as a what?
Bell stopped using the liquid-based method after what month?
Bell used his own design in all public demonstrations and what?

context: Although Bell was, and still is, accused of stealing the telephone from Gray, Bell used Gray's water transmitter design only after Bell's patent had been granted, and only as a <a0_0>proof of concept<a0_0/> scientific experiment, to prove to his own satisfaction that intelligible "articulate speech" (Bell's words) could be electrically transmitted. After <a1_0>March<a1_0/> 1876, Bell focused on improving the electromagnetic telephone and never used Gray's liquid transmitter in public demonstrations or <a2_0>commercial use<a2_0/>.
